input: So these tools basically are tools to find and source people. Some of the tools that are very prevalent in today's market, one of my absolute favorites is LinkedIn. It has connected millions upon millions of people throughout various countries in technology.
offline_reference: 因此，这些工具本质上是用来寻找和发掘人才的，如今市场上广泛使用的诸多工具中，我最钟爱的莫过于领英，它已将全球各地数以百万计的人通过科技连接在一起。
